name: CommandFusion
tag_list: iphone, ipad, apple, android, iviewer, guidesigner, control, automation, home, commercial, support, software, hardware
overview:
CommandFusion manufacturers hardware and software for both the automation and control industries.

CommandFusion has been selling its flagship control software product (CommandFusion iViewer) for iOS since 2008. Renowned for its flexibility and versatility, iViewer is now available for both iOS and Android platforms.

The hardware lineup has recently been released, CommandFusion has been working on the hardware product line since 2008. With a small, dynamic and driven international team made up of individuals from the automation, software and hardware fields, CommandFusion strives to offer the best support and fastest innovation turnaround in the industry.

The hardware offers flexibility, reliability and scale-ability - Making it suitable for installations of any size. Documentation is provided for all protocols used, making it easy to integrate with other systems.
